Text:
We have a gluten free household of 5. No one in our family likes these. My children (9, 7, &5) are begging me to throw the box away - I think they are afraid I'll sneak one in their lunchbox. The cookie crumbles leaving a dry mess of rice flour and hardish chewy fruity bits in your mouth. Have a glass of water nearby if you try these. I hate to leave a bad review, but there are way better gluten free options out there.

(I won't throw the box away. I'll pass it on to another gluten free family I know and let them form their own opinion.)
